blog.name: joemerl
blog.title: What Do I Put Here I Don't Know
blog.description: My name is Joey and I'm on Tumblr mostly for stupid fandom reasons.

summary: Tony Stark for the character thing
question: Tony Stark for the character thing
answer:
(I’m gonna focus mainly on the MCU version, because it’s the one that I’m most familiar with, though warning that I’m actually rather behind on the MCU.)

  • Why I like them: Well, he has some great lines and character development.
  • Why I don’t: Man, is he a douche sometimes!
  • Favorite episode (scene if movie): I went and watched a “Best of Tony Stark” compilation of Youtube and I couldn’t figure out anything definite, to be honest. 
  • Favorite season/movie: I can’t decide, especially since I haven’t seen all of them yet. 
  • Favorite line: “Hmm. Which happens, dads leave, no need to be a pussy about it. Here’s what I need—”
  • Favorite outfit: The classic suit design, I guess.
  • OTP: Him and Pepper.
  • Brotp: Again, way behind, but it’ll probably be him and Peter when I get that far. I also really like him and Harley from IM3, largely because Tony is just…refusing to do the “substitute dad” trope that he winds up doing with Peter later.  
  • Head Canon: Upon learning of the term “headcanon,” he will totally try to make a cannon in his suit’s head.
  • Unpopular opinion: I thought Iron Man 2 was pretty good, actually.
  • A wish: Just that he gets a really good sending-off in Endgame.
  • An oh-god-please-dont-ever-happen: I’m sure that the Russo brothers will let him quietly retire with Pepper instead of killing him off, right?
  • 5 words to best describe them: “Asshole billionaire becomes actual hero.”
  • My nickname for them: …Do I have to make one up? How about “Tony Snark?”

blog.name: tigrapurrs
blog.title: Can you hear Tigra purring?
blog.description: Just a little fan site for everyone's favorite feline Avenger, Tigra!

summary: Excerpt
title: Excerpt
body:
Here’s a quick excerpt for a storyline we were talking about on Twitter

“No, hey, Tigra, NO, you can’t do this.” Behind his mask, she could hear the tremor in Pete’s voice, his heartbeat racing.

“Forget it, Peter.” She was through with secret identities. Through with all the ritual surrounding being a super hero. She couldn’t get the look of surprise frozen on what was left of Tony’s face, the smell of Tony’s blood and burned flesh out of her nose. She knew that would haunt her the rest of her days. “You can’t talk me out of this. Osborn has it coming.”

Next to him, MJ was hugging herself, her beautiful eyes haunted, and she bit her lip as Peter continued trying to argue. “Look, no one has more reason to hate the guy than me. He’s been ruining my life for years, and I–”

“Tony. Is. Dead.” She whirled on him, the growl in her voice making everyone flinch. She was sounding less like a pissed off woman and more like an agitated Tiger by the minute. 

“Yeah, I know, I get it, He was my friend too, but Greer–”

Unable to stop herself, she advanced on him, aggressively enough that he took a reflexive step back and put a protective arm between MJ and herself, which only served to piss her off more. As though she would ever harm either one of them.

“Take off your mask, Peter.” She was face to face with him, eyeball to giant spider eye.

“Wh-what?”

“Take it off, I want to look you in the eye.”

Slowly, clearly reluctantly, he reached up and pulled the mask off his head. He looked tired, dark circles under his bloodshot eyes, a day’s growth of stubble on his cheeks, his hair mussed.

“Now understand me. I’m going to kill Norman Osborn. For what he did to Tony. For what he did to me. For what he’s done to you. I’m going to chase him down and rip his throat out, and I’m going to look him in the eye as he dies.” She advanced another step, her claws flexed and out, her tail lashing, “Now I don’t want to, but if you get in my way, I will go through you.”

“No,” Peter licked his dry lips. “I won’t let you do this…” and then MJ laid a hand on this arm.

“Pete, I think you should step aside.”

“What?” He turned, almost shouting the word.

“She’s…she’s right, Pete. That man has made our lives a living hell. For years.”

“We don’t…” Peter paused searching for words.

“Alright that’s enough.” Captain America strode in, pulling his own mask off as he did. Tall and imposing, he filled the little conference room with his presence. Larger than life, the legendary super soldier. She whirled on Cap, her love and respect for him tempering some of her rage. She could feel the grief coming off of him. Clint as well, because Hawkeye and Mockingbird were entering on his heels, Clint angry, Bobbi subdued.

“Stay out of this, Steve,” she warned.

“We both know I can’t do that, Greer. Osborn is going down for this, I give you my word, but we’re Avengers–”

She cut him off, practically spitting, “And we don’t kill, I know, I’ve heard it before.”

Clint piped up. “Cmon, Greer, we’re all pissed, we’re all hurting.” He put his head down, and for a second it was all she could do to not run and give them a hug. Pull them all into a hug and purr the sadness out of them.

But Tony, lying in the middle of his office, Pepper screaming, her own arm and the left side of her body burned and covered with shards of glass, Tony’s look of surprise. A bomb. It all rushed into her head and she felt the familiar, comfortable fury rushing in again. She could cry later.

Now she wanted blood.

Steve carefully placed both hands on the conference table, steepling his fingers. “We’re the Avengers, Greer. We don’t kill. You know that.”

“Not anymore.” Coldly, she fished her Avengers card out of her top and very deliberately placed it on the table.

Clint interjected, “Aww, no, Greer, no. Don’t do this.”

“When’s the last time I was even an Avenger? You guys don’t seem to want me anyway.” She was stalking around the table when Cap stepped between her and the door.

“No. Tigra, think this through. You’re about to do something that can’t be undone. Don’t do this.”

“Steve, please stand aside, unless you’re placing me under arrest.” She swallowed, but she was proud of never wavering.

Steve looked tired. He ran a hand over his face, and then he stepped out of her way.

Bobbi’s Avengers card landed next to hers.

“I’m going with her. I’m not really an Avenger anymore either. Tony was my friend, and I was an Agent of Shield. We do what’s gotta be done.”

She flashed Bobbi a small, relieved, grateful smile. Then they left the office, Clint’s protests in their ears

blog.title: Multi-stan
blog.description: i come on here legit once every month

summary: INCORRECT IRONDAD
body:
INCORRECT IRONDAD

Peter: why does everyone hate Mr Loki I think he’s great

Tony: he tried to take over the world and kill everyone

Peter: *stabs tony with a plastic spoon* look I just tried to kill you, do you hate me now?

Tony: kid I-

Peter: *gasps intensely* mR sTArK!?!?!

blog.name: incorrectlly-avenging
blog.title: Tony Stark owns my life
blog.description: And really so do all the other marvel people but Tony especially. 616!Tony especially.

summary:
Tony: At first, I didn't understand why people loved their kids that they have a mentor/father figure relationship with.
Tony:...
body:
Tony: At first, I didn’t understand why people loved their kids that they have a mentor/father figure relationship with.

Tony: That’s until I got a Peter too.

Tony: If anything happened to him I would first kill everyone in this room and then miself.

blog.name: incorrect-avengerss
blog.title:
• incorrect MCU Quotes •
• headcanons too •
blog.description:
• I’ll mostly post on weekends •

• feel free to ask questions, submit prompts etc •

• Hit that follow button :) •

summary:
Headcanon that Peter makes personalized flower crowns for the Avengers-
Tony wakes up one day to find a flower crown with red,...
body:
Headcanon that Peter makes personalized flower crowns for the Avengers-

Tony wakes up one day to find a flower crown with red, yellow, and light blue flowers with a note attached that says: for tony ;) -Peter

Cap finds a red, white, and blue flower crown with another note attached etc.

Eventually they all start to wear them regularly and it becomes normal to see avengers waking around wearing Peter’s flower crowns

reblog.comment:

summary: I wanted to point out something. Look at the difference between these two pictures. Both are Tony realizing that he is probably...
body:
I wanted to point out something. Look at the difference between these two pictures. Both are Tony realizing that he is probably going to die. In Avengers, he sent the missile into the hole and made peace that everyone in New York would live. In Avengers Endgame, Tony has just lost everyone he loved and now he’s going to die. In both, Tony is about to die. There is only one difference between these scenarios.

Tony isn’t afraid of dying because he’ll be dead, he’s afraid of dying because he won’t be able to save the ones he loves.

Okay have a nice day.

reblog.comment:

Okay have a nice day.

summary: The Time of Year For Family
title: The Time of Year For Family
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Va6Gxk

by a_c_perky

Christmas was the most magical time of the year.
It’s the time of giving, sharing, festive lights, drinking ALL the hot cocoa you want, and celebrating with your loved ones.

Friends celebrate and laugh, families get together, and in some cases, families are formed.

Maybe that’s why Peter Parker did what he did.
***
Peter Parker has one wish from Tony for Christmas but is fearful that Tony will not want to give him that.
Little does he know, Tony is asking for the exact same thing.
***
Just a LATE Christmas fluff fic with my favorite father-son duo.
This is my first fic on A03, so I hope all of you enjoy!

Words: 1619, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017), Iron Man (Movies), Marvel Cinematic Universe
  • Rating: Not Rated
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: Other

  • Relationships: Peter Parker & Tony Stark, Pepper Potts/Tony Stark
  • Additional Tags: Christmas, Mentions of Christianity, Cuddling, Father son relationship, Dad! Tony and Son! Peter, Adoption, Happy Ending, Fluff, Precious Peter Parker, spiderson, Irondad, Tony Stark Acting as Peter Parker’s Parental Figure, Tony Stark Has A Heart, Awesome Pepper Potts, Awesome May Parker (Spider-Man)

blog.name: zajelimilogin
blog.title: Dream a little bigger, darling.
blog.description:
Woman.
Determined.
Braided.

What else?
Normality is overrated.
Wibbly wobbly, timey wimey.
Black, two sugars. I'll be upstairs.
One more miracle, please.

You mustn't be afraid to dream a little bigger, darling.

summary: That Would Be Enough
title: That Would Be Enough
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2AiDWJO

by Bananza_Milkshakez

A year after the Homecoming incident, Peter and Tony are getting closer. But May is becoming more distant and Peter is worried that they will never be the same.

I’m just saying that May will be awesome further into the story, sorry? The events of this story will lead to Infinity was - sorry not sorry.

blog.name: actuallythegeniusbillionaire
blog.title: You Know Who I Am
blog.description: Genius, billionaire, playboy, philanthropist. I'm sure you've heard the story, you know how it goes. If you have any pressing questions, feel free to ask away. I'll try to respond as fast as possible, but just keep in mind official consulting hours are actually between eight and five every other Thursday.

blog.title: Ironstrange is the endgame
blog.description:
she/her. call me juls. my soul belongs to marvel since 2008,
ironstrange shipper since 2016 hyped af for captain marvel and avengers: endgame.
i love to make gif/edits and write. speak to me about ironwidowstrange

trail.content:
I’m screaming and keeping my fingers crossed

blog.name: publisher021
blog.title: Publisher021
blog.description: fan made edits | commissions | drawings

summary: Tony Stark will survive the ENDGAME
body:
Tony Stark will survive the ENDGAME

So I have a rant. Well, actually, I have a theory. Based on facts so.

Tony Stark will survive the endgame and he will not die in space:

> He says the words “with no chance of rescue” in the official trailer aired by Marvel. ‘Rescue’ is the name of Pepper’s Iron Woman suit and we see her in the suit on posts on Instagram.

> Rdj recently did an ad with Audi for the new car being released. And he says that the car gets used by Tony in Infinity War part two.

How can Tony drive a car in space?

The answer: he can’t.

Therefore, Tony gets rescued and drives the new Audi in the movie.

Our messages to NASA have been answered.

Our homeboi Tony Stark will live.
